snippet: Omar Hammami, who grew up in Alabama, was known for his rap-infused propaganda videos for the Shabab, a brutal Islamist group.
abstract: American jihadist Omar Hammami is believed to have been killed in Somalia by his former extremist allies in the Shabab; if true, his death would bring to a close one of the more unusual chapters in more than two decades of fighting in the Horn of Africa.

byline.contributor: Andrea Elliott contributed reporting from New York, and Mohammed Ibrahim from Mogadishu, Somalia.

lead_paragraph: Omar Hammami, who grew up in Alabama, was known for his rap-infused propaganda videos for the Shabab, a brutal Islamist group.

headline.main: American Jihadist Is Believed to Have Been Killed by His Former Allies in Somalia
headline.print_headline: American Jihadist Is Believed to Have Been Killed by His Former Allies in Somalia
